name: @polkajs/rencode
description: Improved Bencode style compression while maintaining type and primitive data

scripts.lint+build+test: yarn run lint && yarn run build && yarn run test
scripts.build: echo building... && babel src/ -d lib/ && echo 'successfully built'
scripts.test: echo running server tests... && tape test/**/*.js && echo 'successfully completed tests'

author: Craig OConnor
